Package foundation.omni.netapi.omnicore

Class OmniCoreClient

java.lang.Object
foundation.omni.netapi.omnicore.OmniCoreClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConsensusService, OmniBalanceService, ConsensusFetcher, AutoCloseable, RichListService<OmniValue,CurrencyID>, ChainTipService
Direct Known Subclasses:
OmniCoreConsensusTool
public class OmniCoreClient extends Object implements ConsensusService, RichListService<OmniValue,CurrencyID>, AutoCloseable
Omni Core "REST" client that implements same interfaces as Omniwallet REST client
